name: pareto-dollar
description: Smart contracts for Pareto synthetic dollar

scripts.deploy: forge clean && forge build && forge script ./script/Deploy.s.sol --ledger --broadcast --optimize --optimizer-runs 99999 --verify --sender "0xe5dab8208c1f4cce15883348b72086dbace3e64b" --slow -vvv && cp -R out/build-info/* old-build-info
scripts.upgrade: forge clean && forge build && forge script ./script/Upgrade.s.sol --ledger --broadcast --optimize --optimizer-runs 99999 --verify --sender "0xe5dab8208c1f4cce15883348b72086dbace3e64b" --slow -vvv && cp -R out/build-info/* old-build-info
scripts.lint: bun run lint:sol && bun run prettier:check
scripts.test:coverage:report: forge coverage --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
